mapper.select:
select a.seq, b.name, b.nickName, a.user_seq, a.blogCategory_seq, c.categoryName, a.buied, a.title
order by a.seq desc

select a.seq, a.blogIntroduction, a.modelHeight, a.modelWeight, a.modelSize, a.modelShoesSize, a.blogCategory_seq, a.user_seq, a.buied, a.title, b.name, b.nickName, c.categoryName from betterBlog as a left join user as b on a.user_seq = b.seq left join blogCategory as c on a.blogCategory_seq = c.seq where 1=1 and a.seq = #{seq}

select a.seq, b.seq as infoseq, b.item, b.itemBrand, b.infoPrice, b.buyLink
from betterBlog as a left join clotheInfo as b on a.seq = b.betterBlog_seq where 1=1 and a.seq = #{seq} order by infoseq asc
select a.seq as bcSeq, a.categoryName from blogCategory as a where 1=1 order by a.seq asc
